mapper.select: select i.itm_code, i.itm_name, i.itm_day_output, m.mat_code, m.mat_name from item i, material m where i.mat_code = m.mat_code and i.itm_code = #{itmCode}
select prd_com_d_num, prd_plan_d_num, ord_d_num, prd_com_vol, Prc_com_div from produce_command_d where prd_com_num = #{prdComNum}
mapper.insert:
SELECT nvl(MAX(prd_com_mat_num),0)+1 FROM produce_command_mat
insert into produce_command_mat(prd_com_mat_num, prd_com_d_num, mat_code, lot_num, mat_vol, prd_com_mat_O, prd_com_mat_note) values(#{prdComMatNum}, #{prdComDNum}, #{matCode}, #{lotNum}, #{matVol}, #{prdComMatO}, #{prdComMatNote})
insert into material_history_d(mat_his_d_num, mat_his_num, mat_code, lot_num, mat_his_d_vol) values(MATERIAL_HISTORY_SEQ.nextval, #{matHisNum}, #{matCode}, #{lotNum}, #{matVol})
insert into process_result_d(prc_res_d_num, mov_num, prc_res_no, prc_code, prc_state, prc_com_d_vol) values(PROCESS_RESULT_D_SEQ.nextval, #{movNum}, #{prcFNo}, #{prcCode}, '진행',#{matVol})
insert into process_result_d(prc_res_d_num, mov_num, prc_res_no, prc_code, prc_state, prc_com_d_vol) values(PROCESS_RESULT_D_SEQ.nextval, #{movNum}, #{prcFNo}, #{prcCode}, '진행', 0)
